references.paper_title: Making a "completely blind" image quality analyzer

references.paper_title: From patches to pictures (PaQ-2-PiQ): Mapping the perceptual space of picture quality
references.reason: This paper offers an innovative approach to image quality assessment by using patches and then mapping to the whole picture, leading to improved accuracy.
